lyrics.stanza: "All in His hands"—what confidence it brings To tested hearts, to know that all the things That make up life and circumstance, He holds In His strong hands, and patiently unfolds Th' eternal purpose of His sovereign Will— That all things shall His grace and glory fill.

"All in His hands"? Then life with purpose moves Within the circle of His will, and proves It good, acceptable. The hands of man Or Satan cannot mar or foil the plan Which God ordained—to manifest His Son In earthen vessels, to a world undone.
